    A EngineGraphQLGitHub class

    EngineGraphQLGitHub.Rd

    A class for methods wrapping GitHub's GraphQL API responses.

    Super class

    GitStats::EngineGraphQL -> EngineGraphQLGitHub

    Methods

    Public methods

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$new()

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_orgs()

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_repos()

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_repos_supportive()

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_commits()

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_commits_supportive()

    • EngineGraphQLGitHub$clone()

    Inherited methods

    • GitStats::EngineGraphQL$gql_response()

    • GitStats::EngineGraphQL$pull_users()

    Method new()

    Create EngineGraphQLGitHub object.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$new(gql_api_url, token, scan_all = FALSE)

    Arguments

    gql_api_url

    GraphQL API url.

    token

    A token.

    scan_all

    A boolean.

    Method pull_orgs()

    Get all orgs from GitHub.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_orgs()

    Method pull_repos()

    A method to retrieve all repositories for an organization in a table format.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_repos(org, settings)

    Arguments

    org

    An organization.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Returns

    A table.

    Method pull_repos_supportive()

    An empty method to satisfy engine iterator.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_repos_supportive(org, settings)

    Arguments

    org

    An organization.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Returns

    Nothing.

    Method pull_commits()

    Method to pull all commits from organization, optionally filtered by team members.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_commits(org, date_from, date_until, settings)

    Arguments

    org

    An organization.

    date_from

    A starting date to look commits for.

    date_until

    An end date to look commits for.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Returns

    A table of commits.

    Method pull_commits_supportive()

    Method to get commits.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$pull_commits_supportive(
  org,
  date_from,
  date_until = Sys.date(),
  settings
)

    Arguments

    org

    An organization.

    date_from

    A starting date to look commits for.

    date_until

    An end date to look commits for.

    settings

    A list of GitStats settings.

    Details

    This method must exist as it is called from the GitHost wrapper above.

    Returns

    A table of commits.

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    EngineGraphQLGitHub$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
